name: ChoresWizard
0:
”Alexa, open chores wizard”
”Alexa, tell chores wizard to give me a chore”
”Alexa, ask chores wizard for a chore”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chores wizard
des:
This skill will make chore choosing much easier. Just ask Alexa to open Chores Wizard and ask for a chore. The tasks range from cleaning floors to doing laundry, dishes, and other household necessary tasks. 

Don't like your choice? No need to fret as there are 30 different chores to choose from. This skill is great for the whole family. It makes chore-picking fun and can be used to divide up necessary tasks.

Additionally, the skill has a fun wizardly twist. The wizard appears to provide the job and says abra cadabra before divvying out each task.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
